es.usal.tfg

Class MyTaskExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.usal.tfg.MyTaskExecutor

  • public class MyTaskExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class to control ScheduledExecutorService taking into account the daylight saving issues because it calculate the delay until the desired time every day.
    Author:
    Sage
    See Also:
    Referencia

      • startExecution

        public static boolean startExecution(java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<java.io.File> task)
        Inicia la ejecución de un hilo PDF.
        Parameters:
        task - FutureTask que ejecutará el PDFThread
        Returns:
        true, si arranca correctamente, o false, en caso contrario
        See Also:
        Referencia, PDFThread

      • startScheduleExecutionAt

        public void startScheduleExecutionAt(int targetHour,
                                     int targetMin,
                                     int targetSec)
        Schedule a thread that execute the maintenanceTask and at the end it calculate the next delay and program itself to execute at that time.
        Parameters:
        targetHour - the target hour
        targetMin - the target min
        targetSec - the target sec

      • computeNextDelay

        private long computeNextDelay(int targetHour,
                              int targetMin,
                              int targetSec)
        Compute next delay.
        Parameters:
        targetHour - the target hour
        targetMin - the target min
        targetSec - the target sec
        Returns:
        the delay in seconds

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Para todos los hilos creados y apaga executorScheduled y executor despues espera un tiempo a que sus hilos acaben en caso de existir alguno ejecutandose. Si tras ese tiempo aún no han acabado sale pero se produciria un MemoryLeak que Tomcat detectaría al apagarse
